S.FORM: Croatia u Croatia sa ilabu nu Oco, itiza i 45 10 N, 15 30 E. u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa 56,594 sq km. u ahebal nu lala'ay sa 55,974 sq km, u ahebal nu nanumay sa 620 sq km. hamin nu tademaw sa 4,313,707.kakalukan umah sa 23.70%, kilakilangan umah sa 34.40%, zumaay henay umah sa 41.90%. tapang tusu nu kanatal u tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Zagreb (Zakelyepu 札格雷布) sapadateng nu kanatal demiad sapadateng nu kanatal demiad sa 8 bulad 10 demiad. tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Zoran Milanović (Zuwalan．Milanuwuweci 佐蘭·米拉諾維奇), 10 bulad 30 demiad 1966 a mihca nalecuhan. u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) nu Croatia ayza, micakat a demiad sa i 2020 a mihca 2 bulad 19 demiad. 10 bulad u cunli nu Croatia ayza sa ci Andrej Plenković, micakat a demiad sa i 2016 a mihcaan 10 bulad 19 demiad. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: :Republika Hrvatska), :Hrvatska, .) Croatia mapulungnay masakaputay a kanatal (Croatia a kamu:Republika Hrvatska), u ngangan tu Croatia (Croatia a kamu:Hrvatska), uynian i Cung-uw , Di-cung-hay atu Ba-rl-kan-ban-daw kalalitemuhan cacay satadengilan nu cence, mapulungay a kanatal a lice , kahenulan a tuse u satabakiay u nu Za-ke-rul-pu , Croatia u kenis u Sing-cen a kakitizaan kenis papiliwasak ku tuse bataan a kasaniyazu' atu cacay sakakuwaan tu tuse mikawaw haca tu kahenulan a tuse nu Za-ke-rul-pu , u ahebal nu lala' 56,538 Ping-bang-kung-li . Croatia kanatal mikawaw tu nu cenbuay makakenisan maliwasak tu tusa bataan a niyazu'an, cacay a kenis mikawaw aca tu sakatusa kahenulan a tuse, a Za-ke-rul-pu , u ahebal nu lala' 56,538 ping-bang-kung-li , Croatia yadah ku masazumaay a demiad, mahini mahiza nu Ta-luay a demiad atu mahiniay nu Di-cung-hay-sing a demiad, atu i Ya-de-li-ya' a bayu a tukus izaw malakuwit cacay malebut a subal, 2019 a mihcaan Croatia a tademaw izaw ku 407 a mang, katuud ku Croatia a tademaw, namakay i Croatia Nan-se-la-bu namisteked hawsa katukuh ayza nuwini a kanatal i tiniyamin i Ba-rl-kan-ban-daw a kanatal malecat lalid mawada tu tademaw. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: Croatia .) Croatia a binacadan celacan tu pitu a kasumamadan, mabulaw tayza ayzaay a Croatia a lala' mauzip, uheni i kasumamadan tu siwaay a mihcaan patizeng tu tusaay a kanatal, zikuzan i 925 a mihcaan Tu-mi-se-la-bu papulung palacacay tu hung-ti a kanatal, mala u saayaway tu hung-ti, i laylay masadipadipas tu Bau-ciya-li-ya saayaway a hung-ti a kanatal, Can-ting-ti-kuw atu Sung-ya-li a kanatal madademec, saca atu Wey-ni-se De-li-ya madatemec tudadipasan, uynian a kanatal namakay cacay bataan a kasumamadan malingatu tu i pikuwanay a kenis mipatiyak tu Croatia a kamu namahini satu madatemec tu Ciyaw-cung . (u kamu nu Hulam sa: Croatia .) laylay i kasumamadan a ayzaay i tepang nu kamihcaan nu kasumamadan ayzaay Croatia a lala' saayaw nu laylay namihcaan, izaw tu tademaw nuenemay, Croatia nuamisan yadah ku maazihay tu naayaway a demiad tu Ciw-se-ci-se- day Cung-ye tu ni u Ni-an-de-ta a tdemaw malaba'tu tu, uyni u katahekal nu Ce-la-pi-na uyza u aazihan .Ha-bu-se-baw-wang-cen katukuh i kamihcaan nu hung-ti a kanatal nu Aw-sun-ti-ku (Ha-bu-se-baw-wan-cen katukuh i Aw-sung hung-tiay a mihcaan . (u kamu nu Hulam sa: .) uyza u E'-tu-man-di hitay nukanatal lalit sana pakatemic, Aw-di-li a cenbu i 1538 a mihcaan u Croatia cacay pala tusaen, palaliyas tu pakuyucay atu kakitizaan nu hitay atu u hung-tiay a kanatal, cenbu paucul tu sakakaay nu hitay amikedec tu kawaw nuhitay, u binawlan sikuwang tu amin miedap tu Aw-di-li a hitay. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: .) Ha-bu-se-baw-wang-cen katukuh i kamihcaan nu hung-ti a kanatal nu Aw-sun-ti-ku (Ha-bu-se-baw-wan-cen katukuh i Aw-sung hung-tiay a mihcaan uyza u E'-tu-man-di hitay nukanatal lalit sana pakatemic, Aw-di-li a cen-hu i 1538 a mihcaan u Croatia cacay pala tusaen, palaliyas tu pakuyucay atu kakitizaan nu hitay atu u hung-tiay a kanatal, cenbu paucul tu sakakaay nu hitay amikedec tu kawaw nuhitay, u binawlan sikuwang tu amin miedap tu Aw-di-li a hitay. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: .) u sakacacay a ngangayaw nu kitakit atu Nan-se-la-bu a kanatal 1925年, . 1925 a mihcaan, Croatia malukay a tademaw a tapang miala tu misakaku a sakuwan, tazazan amitaliyuk tu sakakawawan a maazih ku mahiniay. sakatusa a ngangayaw nu kitakit 1941 a mihcaan sepat a bulad , Nan-se-la-bu malikit a maala micumut tu sakatusa a ngangayaw nu kitakit(sakatusaay nu kitakit satabakiay masasungayaw, 第二次世界大戰), De-ku, Yi'-ta-li' amikuwan tu Pa-el-kan-pan-daw , kilul satu kuni kapulung sapalekakep a cabay Aw-sun-ti-ku a kanatal atu Paw-ciy-li-ya a kanatal micunut midebung tu Nan-se-la-bu . Nan-se-la-bu mapulungay maakaputay katukuh i masakaku Croatia u lecuh tu Nan-se-la-bu nu mikeliday a tademaw ci Ye-se-pu-bu-luo-ze-di-tuo . napahecek tu sakatuse a ngangayaw hawsa, Croatia i suykay ku ni zateng nu uzip amicaput tu Nan-se-la-bu-lian-bang-zen-min-cung-he-ku , muliyaw haca tu tungusay nu Nan-se-la-bu, u Croatia cung-can-cu-yi'-ce-len-mung misakaku a mikawaw, mikawaw tu cacay a teked a kuwaw ,ci Diy-tuw u satalakaway mikeliday mikuwanay a tademaw nu kanatal. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: . Croatia u liwliw nu Croatia a kakitizaan Dun-ow atu Tung-nan-ow malacabay, u pising nu kanatal mahiza u mapikihay nu bulad, kanatal ahebal nu lala'56,594 ping-bang-kung-li , pasu 56,414 ping-bang-kung-li tukusay a lala' kaahebal atu 128 ping-bang-kung-li u nanum a kahebal, pulung a ahebal nu lala', pasilut tu ngangan i kitakit saka 127 , ihekaly a lala' atu ililisay katanayu' 2,028 kung-li sadipasan 1777.3 kung-li (i hekalay a lala'陸地)atu nu subalan 4,058 kung-li (daw-yu島嶼). Croatia u lala' nu kanatal hatu u matatudungay a akuti', u maudaday a akuti' nu Taluay kumahiniay a demiad , paybulad palalecad Se-se-ling-siy 3 du (cacay a bulad katukuh i Se-se18 du pitu a bulad(攝氏18度7月)laed u sienaway a kakitizaan u Li-ka atu Ce-rl se-ci-ce-da-rl kailabu hay-pa 1,200 kung-ce dipah katalakaw nu buyu', u tanayu' macapi tu Ya-de-li-ya mililis tu hekal a kenis malabel nu bayu u cayay kaakuti'ay mhizaay nu Di-cung-hay-ceng a demiad. Za-ce-rul-bu-cung-du-bu , Croatia u kakitizaan nu cenbu Croatia u nu binawlanay a nizateng Min-cu-yi'-huy-kung-he-ze a kanatal. 2009 a mihcaan, Croatia mipuputay tu kanatal a hitay malingatu mikwaw patapapaw tu hata mipada'su tu uynian a kanatal mikaput tu Pay-uy . Croatia ayza izaw tu ku 183 a kanatalan patizang tu uay way-ciaw-kung-si . (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 2009年, .) hitay a kawaw i 2015 a mihcaan 8 a bulad 1 a demiad u niu pakademecan a demiad paazih tu hitay ku Croatia a hitay, nu zazanay a hitay M-84 ku kazizang a sakaput tu sangangayaw. Croatia a hitay Croatia mapulungnay masakaputay a kanatal Wu-cuwang-bu-duy u nu zazanay a hitay, bayuay a hitay atu hikukiay a hitay atu miculuay tu tuud a hitay atu cung-cung atu fang-kung-cung tulu a hitayay ku nisakaputan. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 於2015年8月1日" M-84戰車隊. .) sakikalisiwan 2005 katukuh 2015 a mihcaan a Croatia kanatal a nisanga'an tu nilaculan pulung nu palalecat tu kacakat nu kalisiw, Croatia u satalakaway nu misiwbayay nu micumuday a kalisiw kitakit a kalisiw nu sakaput a ci-cin, kuw-ci-huo-pi-ci-cin-cuw-ce . (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 2005至2015 ,) mikawaway tu papiidangay Aw-pa'-di-ya u Croatia u saayaway palahat a tuse tu mikawaway tu papiidangay mikawaway tu papiidangay i Croatia a sakakikalisiwan u tadakahenulan u kuynian, macalap ku nu i labu nu kuw-min-sen-zang-cong-ze a pulung nu aca 20％, i 2014 a mihcaan paymihcaan kumahiniay micumuday a kalisiw 74 i' nu Oway a kalisiw. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 奧帕蒂亞是Croatia 74億歐元.) kamu Croatia u kamu nu kanatal u nu Croatia a kamu namialapu tu Ou-meng hawsa kilulu satu mala u uynian a sakaput u saka 24 alamangan nu kanatal a kamu, Croatia a hulic izaw kunipaketung aca tu cayay kakatuud nu binacadan taneng i panutekang tu tadelekan amusakamu tu kamu Cie-ke a kamu, Siung-ya-li a kamu, i'-ta-li a kamu, Lu-say-ni-ya a kamu, Say-rl-uaw-ya a kamu atu Se-lu'-ba-ke a kamu uynian a kamu cayay kakatuud a binacadan. u mikeliday a lalayan namakay kasumamadan tu 17 a mihcaan Croatia tuzumaay a zikuc, Croatia i tizaay a angangan masanga'tu pasusepatay malalacanay a lalangawan pasu nuwalian satipan tusaay a kakitizaan nu Zan-ting-di-ku atu satipan nu Lu-ma-ti-ku, pasu Cung-o atu Di-cung-hay a lalangawan. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: .) malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan CIA 外交部

Croatia o Croatia sa ilabo no Oco, itiza i 45 10 N, 15 30 E. o ahebal no lala' mapolong sa 56,594 sq km. o ahebal no lala'ay sa 55,974 sq km, o ahebal no nanomay sa 620 sq km. hamin no tademaw sa 4,313,707.kakalokan omah sa 23.70%, kilakilangan omah sa 34.40%, zomaay henay omah sa 41.90%. tapang toso no kanatal o tapang toso no kanatal sa o Zagreb (Zakelyepo 札格雷布) sapadateng no kanatal demiad sapadateng no kanatal demiad sa 8 bolad 10 demiad. tabakiay a tapang no kanatal o tabakiay a tapang no kanatal (congtong) ayza sa ci Zoran Milanović (Zowalan．Milanowoweci 佐蘭·米拉諾維奇), 10 bolad 30 demiad 1966 a mihca nalecohan. o tabakiay a tapang no kanatal (congtong) no Croatia ayza, micakat a demiad sa i 2020 a mihca 2 bolad 19 demiad. 10 bolad o conli no Croatia ayza sa ci Andrej Plenković, micakat a demiad sa i 2016 a mihcaan 10 bolad 19 demiad. (o kamo no Holam sa: :Repoblika Hrvatska), :Hrvatska, .) Croatia mapolongnay masakapotay a kanatal (Croatia a kamo:Repoblika Hrvatska), o ngangan to Croatia (Croatia a kamo:Hrvatska), oynian i Cong-ow , Di-cong-hay ato Ba-rl-kan-ban-daw kalalitemohan cacay satadengilan no cence, mapolongay a kanatal a lice , kahenolan a tose o satabakiay o no Za-ke-rol-po , Croatia o kenis o Sing-cen a kakitizaan kenis papiliwasak ko tose bataan a kasaniyazo' ato cacay sakakowaan to tose mikawaw haca to kahenolan a tose no Za-ke-rol-po , o ahebal no lala' 56,538 Ping-bang-kong-li . Croatia kanatal mikawaw to no cenboay makakenisan maliwasak to tosa bataan a niyazo'an, cacay a kenis mikawaw aca to sakatosa kahenolan a tose, a Za-ke-rol-po , o ahebal no lala' 56,538 ping-bang-kong-li , Croatia yadah ko masazomaay a demiad, mahini mahiza no Ta-loay a demiad ato mahiniay no Di-cong-hay-sing a demiad, ato i Ya-de-li-ya' a bayo a tokos izaw malakowit cacay malebot a sobal, 2019 a mihcaan Croatia a tademaw izaw ko 407 a mang, katood ko Croatia a tademaw, namakay i Croatia Nan-se-la-bo namisteked hawsa katokoh ayza nowini a kanatal i tiniyamin i Ba-rl-kan-ban-daw a kanatal malecat lalid mawada to tademaw. (o kamo no Holam sa: Croatia .) Croatia a binacadan celacan to pito a kasomamadan, mabolaw tayza ayzaay a Croatia a lala' maozip, oheni i kasomamadan to siwaay a mihcaan patizeng to tosaay a kanatal, zikozan i 925 a mihcaan To-mi-se-la-bo papolong palacacay to hong-ti a kanatal, mala o saayaway to hong-ti, i laylay masadipadipas to Bao-ciya-li-ya saayaway a hong-ti a kanatal, Can-ting-ti-kow ato Song-ya-li a kanatal madademec, saca ato Wey-ni-se De-li-ya madatemec todadipasan, oynian a kanatal namakay cacay bataan a kasomamadan malingato to i pikowanay a kenis mipatiyak to Croatia a kamo namahini sato madatemec to Ciyaw-cong . (o kamo no Holam sa: Croatia .) laylay i kasomamadan a ayzaay i tepang no kamihcaan no kasomamadan ayzaay Croatia a lala' saayaw no laylay namihcaan, izaw to tademaw noenemay, Croatia noamisan yadah ko maazihay to naayaway a demiad to Ciw-se-ci-se- day Cong-ye to ni o Ni-an-de-ta a tdemaw malaba'to to, oyni o katahekal no Ce-la-pi-na oyza o aazihan .Ha-bo-se-baw-wang-cen katokoh i kamihcaan no hong-ti a kanatal no Aw-son-ti-ko (Ha-bo-se-baw-wan-cen katokoh i Aw-song hong-tiay a mihcaan . (o kamo no Holam sa: .) oyza o E'-to-man-di hitay nokanatal lalit sana pakatemic, Aw-di-li a cenbo i 1538 a mihcaan o Croatia cacay pala tosaen, palaliyas to pakoyocay ato kakitizaan no hitay ato o hong-tiay a kanatal, cenbo paocol to sakakaay no hitay amikedec to kawaw nohitay, o binawlan sikowang to amin miedap to Aw-di-li a hitay. (o kamo no Holam sa: .) Ha-bo-se-baw-wang-cen katokoh i kamihcaan no hong-ti a kanatal no Aw-son-ti-ko (Ha-bo-se-baw-wan-cen katokoh i Aw-song hong-tiay a mihcaan oyza o E'-to-man-di hitay nokanatal lalit sana pakatemic, Aw-di-li a cen-ho i 1538 a mihcaan o Croatia cacay pala tosaen, palaliyas to pakoyocay ato kakitizaan no hitay ato o hong-tiay a kanatal, cenbo paocol to sakakaay no hitay amikedec to kawaw nohitay, o binawlan sikowang to amin miedap to Aw-di-li a hitay. (o kamo no Holam sa: .) o sakacacay a ngangayaw no kitakit ato Nan-se-la-bo a kanatal 1925年, . 1925 a mihcaan, Croatia malokay a tademaw a tapang miala to misakako a sakowan, tazazan amitaliyok to sakakawawan a maazih ko mahiniay. sakatosa a ngangayaw no kitakit 1941 a mihcaan sepat a bolad , Nan-se-la-bo malikit a maala micomot to sakatosa a ngangayaw no kitakit(sakatosaay no kitakit satabakiay masasongayaw, 第二次世界大戰), De-ko, Yi'-ta-li' amikowan to Pa-el-kan-pan-daw , kilol sato koni kapolong sapalekakep a cabay Aw-son-ti-ko a kanatal ato Paw-ciy-li-ya a kanatal miconot midebong to Nan-se-la-bo . Nan-se-la-bo mapolongay maakapotay katokoh i masakako Croatia o lecoh to Nan-se-la-bo no mikeliday a tademaw ci Ye-se-po-bo-loo-ze-di-too . napahecek to sakatose a ngangayaw hawsa, Croatia i soykay ko ni zateng no ozip amicapot to Nan-se-la-bo-lian-bang-zen-min-cong-he-ko , moliyaw haca to tongosay no Nan-se-la-bo, o Croatia cong-can-co-yi'-ce-len-mong misakako a mikawaw, mikawaw to cacay a teked a kowaw ,ci Diy-tow o satalakaway mikeliday mikowanay a tademaw no kanatal. (o kamo no Holam sa: . Croatia o liwliw no Croatia a kakitizaan Don-ow ato Tong-nan-ow malacabay, o pising no kanatal mahiza o mapikihay no bolad, kanatal ahebal no lala'56,594 ping-bang-kong-li , paso 56,414 ping-bang-kong-li tokosay a lala' kaahebal ato 128 ping-bang-kong-li o nanom a kahebal, polong a ahebal no lala', pasilot to ngangan i kitakit saka 127 , ihekaly a lala' ato ililisay katanayo' 2,028 kong-li sadipasan 1777.3 kong-li (i hekalay a lala'陸地)ato no sobalan 4,058 kong-li (daw-yo島嶼). Croatia o lala' no kanatal hato o matatodongay a akoti', o maodaday a akoti' no Taloay komahiniay a demiad , paybolad palalecad Se-se-ling-siy 3 do (cacay a bolad katokoh i Se-se18 do pito a bolad(攝氏18度7月)laed o sienaway a kakitizaan o Li-ka ato Ce-rl se-ci-ce-da-rl kailabo hay-pa 1,200 kong-ce dipah katalakaw no boyo', o tanayo' macapi to Ya-de-li-ya mililis to hekal a kenis malabel no bayo o cayay kaakoti'ay mhizaay no Di-cong-hay-ceng a demiad. Za-ce-rol-bo-cong-do-bo , Croatia o kakitizaan no cenbo Croatia o no binawlanay a nizateng Min-co-yi'-hoy-kong-he-ze a kanatal. 2009 a mihcaan, Croatia mipopotay to kanatal a hitay malingato mikwaw patapapaw to hata mipada'so to oynian a kanatal mikapot to Pay-oy . Croatia ayza izaw to ko 183 a kanatalan patizang to oay way-ciaw-kong-si . (o kamo no Holam sa: 2009年, .) hitay a kawaw i 2015 a mihcaan 8 a bolad 1 a demiad o nio pakademecan a demiad paazih to hitay ko Croatia a hitay, no zazanay a hitay M-84 ko kazizang a sakapot to sangangayaw. Croatia a hitay Croatia mapolongnay masakapotay a kanatal Wo-cowang-bo-doy o no zazanay a hitay, bayoay a hitay ato hikokiay a hitay ato micoloay to tood a hitay ato cong-cong ato fang-kong-cong tolo a hitayay ko nisakapotan. (o kamo no Holam sa: 於2015年8月1日" M-84戰車隊. .) sakikalisiwan 2005 katokoh 2015 a mihcaan a Croatia kanatal a nisanga'an to nilacolan polong no palalecat to kacakat no kalisiw, Croatia o satalakaway no misiwbayay no micomoday a kalisiw kitakit a kalisiw no sakapot a ci-cin, kow-ci-hoo-pi-ci-cin-cow-ce . (o kamo no Holam sa: 2005至2015 ,) mikawaway to papiidangay Aw-pa'-di-ya o Croatia o saayaway palahat a tose to mikawaway to papiidangay mikawaway to papiidangay i Croatia a sakakikalisiwan o tadakahenolan o koynian, macalap ko no i labo no kow-min-sen-zang-cong-ze a polong no aca 20％, i 2014 a mihcaan paymihcaan komahiniay micomoday a kalisiw 74 i' no Oway a kalisiw. (o kamo no Holam sa: 奧帕蒂亞是Croatia 74億歐元.) kamo Croatia o kamo no kanatal o no Croatia a kamo namialapo to Oo-meng hawsa kilolo sato mala o oynian a sakapot o saka 24 alamangan no kanatal a kamo, Croatia a holic izaw konipaketong aca to cayay kakatood no binacadan taneng i panotekang to tadelekan amosakamo to kamo Cie-ke a kamo, Siong-ya-li a kamo, i'-ta-li a kamo, Lo-say-ni-ya a kamo, Say-rl-oaw-ya a kamo ato Se-lo'-ba-ke a kamo oynian a kamo cayay kakatood a binacadan. o mikeliday a lalayan namakay kasomamadan to 17 a mihcaan Croatia tozomaay a zikoc, Croatia i tizaay a angangan masanga'to pasosepatay malalacanay a lalangawan paso nowalian satipan tosaay a kakitizaan no Zan-ting-di-ko ato satipan no Lo-ma-ti-ko, paso Cong-o ato Di-cong-hay a lalangawan. (o kamo no Holam sa: .) malalitin to ihekalay ato zomaay a natinengan CIA 外交部
